title: Walking Dead's Dave Fennoy Wants Ribs - Gregway Episode 10
description:
A viewer wants to know where he can get Greg's Top 5 foods, so Greg teams up with Dave Fennoy -- the Hulu guy and Lee Everett in The Walking Dead -- to answer the question.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Leave your questions for Greg as a video response and check back every Wednesday and Friday to see what he's saying.

The Vlog playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOlEpGVXWUVv1g9oZi6O95CwRHQd0ulT6

Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/user/GameOverGreggy

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Follow Dave on Twitter: http//www.twitter.com/davefennoy
